entry.tran: 坐在横鞍上地;偏坐在鞍上地
entry.def: When you ride a horse side-saddle, you sit on a special saddle with both your legs on one side rather than one leg on each side of the horse.

example.ex: Naomi was given a pony and taught to ride side-saddle.
example.tran: 别人给娜奥米一匹小型马并教会她如何侧骑马。

means.word_mean: 1. a saddle for a woman; rider sits with both feet on the same side of the horse
1. on or as if on a sidesaddle;

auth_sentence.content: No one ever tried to persuade ladies to drive sidesaddle with both legs hanging out the car door.
